channel.title: How to send 14bits CC to Axoloti with BCR 2000
channel.description:
Hello,
I have now a BCR 2000 midi controler from Behringer, and I've read various posts mentioning 14bits resolution is working to control axoloti's patches. More precisely, the midi/in/cc hr does not react with the 14bit resolution (checking with a disp/dial object). I assume that midi/in/cc hr works with the standard pairs while midi/in/cc hr ii allows to combine non standards CC numbers. Anyone could confirm that?
It is probably a BCR set up issue, since I have the same 7bit result when I patch according this post http://community.axoloti.com/t/midi-in-cc-hr-issues-solved/4520
I've been digging in the BCR's official manual, trough the mountain utilities docs and forum and many other places without any clear explanation on how to set up 14bits CCs in the BCR. When I set the knob on absolute 14bit, I find no way to define or verify the LSB CC number. Many people here use the BCR so I dare to ask them, at least to know where I can learn more about this! Thank you very much!
@thetechnobear, feel free to tell me the right place for this post if I am not already in!

item.title: How to send 14bits CC to Axoloti with BCR 2000
item.dc:creator: @Quentin
item.description:
@Quentin wrote:

Hello,

I have now a BCR 2000 midi controler from Behringer, and I've read various posts mentioning 14bits resolution is working to control axoloti's patches.
More precisely, the midi/in/cc hr does not react with the 14bit resolution (checking with a disp/dial object).
I assume that midi/in/cc hr works with the standard pairs while midi/in/cc hr ii allows to combine non standards CC numbers. Anyone could confirm that?

It is probably a BCR set up issue, since I have the same 7bit result when I patch according this post http://community.axoloti.com/t/midi-in-cc-hr-issues-solved/4520

I've been digging in the BCR's official manual, trough the mountain utilities docs and forum and many other places without any clear explanation on how to set up 14bits CCs in the BCR. When I set the knob on absolute 14bit, I find no way to define or verify the LSB CC number.
Many people here use the BCR so I dare to ask them, at least to know where I can learn more about this!
Thank you very much!

@thetechnobear, feel free to tell me the right place for this post if I am not already in!

Read full topic
